name: Home (itch) (Eezuh)
description:
This game was made for the Blackthornprod Game jam nr. 3

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

You have one goal: find your home

With the help of memory fragments of your past, you get hints to where you home stands, or rather once stood. There are a total of five fragments scattered across the map, each revealing a perhaps vital bit of information.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game is designed and modeled closely after my hometown and there are several important places from my childhood featured in-game with a special nametag.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

All models, textures, coding and musicwere made by me during this one week.  

The game was made and tested on a pc with the following specs:

CPU: i7-7000 @ 3.60GHz

RAM: 8 GB

GPU: GTX 1060 3GB
